title: IDA - How can I get a list of differing instructions from 2 recorded instruction traces?
content:
I have 2 recorded IDA pro instruction traces, how can I get a list of differing instructions?
I am able to load the diffs as overlays but there are a large amount of instructions recorded that are mostly the same so being able to get a short-list of the different instructions would save a lot of time.
Thank you.

answers_data.content:
I don't think this is available from the UI, but there are APIs you can use to enumerate trace log records, e.g. see 
tracing_api
plugin sample in the SDK.

comments.text: Could I please get a link? I've done some googling and read through the help file for IDA but haven't been able to find anything on tracing_api. Thanks.
SDK is available to current customers, check your download email
